info.title: Sonar
info.summary: Airbyte's API retrieves data on behalf of your customers and feeds it to your agentic workflows.
info.description:
The API contains 3 types of endpoints:
- `/api/v1/embedded`: end-user-facing API to collect credentials.
- `/api/v1/sonar`: operator endpoints to fetch data from end-user data sources (apis & drives) with their configured credentials.
- `/api/v1/integrations`: all the operator endpoints to manage configurations.

It is recommended to specify the following header in all your http requests:
```yaml
X-Organization-Id: organization's uuid
```
It will ensure that the right organization is used for all the requests in case your user is a member of multiple organizations.
If you only have one organization, it will default to that one, otherwise the call will fail.

post.description: Generate an application access token using client credentials. This endpoint is intentionally unauthenticated - authentication is performed via client_id and client_secret in the request body.
Post a new message to a thread

post.description:
Create discovery agent jobs for all source definitions tagged with 'discovery-agent'
that don't have existing catalogs.

parameters.name: annotate

schema.description: Whether to annotate the discovered catalogs using the catalog annotator agent
schema.title: Annotate

parameters.description: Whether to annotate the discovered catalogs using the catalog annotator agent

schema.description: Select the working organization. Necessary since users can belong to multiple organizations.
schema.title: X-Organization-Id

parameters.description: Select the working organization. Necessary since users can belong to multiple organizations.

post.description:
Trigger discovery job for a specific source definition.

This endpoint will:
1. Verify a source template with "discovery-agent" tag exists for this source definition
2. Delete any existing catalog to force re-discovery
3. Schedule a new discovery job

This enables re-running discovery for sources that need catalog updates.

Args:
    source_definition_id: The source definition ID to run discovery for

Returns:
    DiscoveryAgentCreateResponse with a single job created

Raises:
    HTTPException 404: Source template not found or not tagged with "discovery-agent"

post.description:
Sign up an organization for PAYG billing and provisioning.
Sets up Orb billing, Stigg subscription, and payment status synchronously.
Returns immediately with success or failure.

This endpoint is idempotent - if signup is already completed, returns existing subscription data
without attempting to re-provision services.

post.description:
Sync workspaces from remote to local database.

Fetches all workspaces for the authenticated organization and creates
any missing workspaces in the local database.

Returns statistics about the sync operation including the total number of workspaces
found and the number created locally.

get.description:
List workspaces for the authenticated organization with cursor-based pagination.

- **name_contains**: Optional filter by workspace name (case-insensitive partial match)
- **status**: Optional filter by workspace status (active or inactive). If not specified, returns all workspaces.
- **limit**: Maximum number of workspaces to return (default: 20, max: 100)
- **cursor**: Pagination cursor from previous response's `next` URL
- **next**: URL for next page (null if no more results)

parameters.name: name_contains

schema.description: Filter workspaces by name (case-insensitive partial match)
schema.title: Name Contains

parameters.description: Filter workspaces by name (case-insensitive partial match)

parameters.name: status

schema.description: Filter workspaces by status (active or inactive). Returns all if not specified.
schema.title: Status

parameters.description: Filter workspaces by status (active or inactive). Returns all if not specified.

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of workspaces to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of workspaces to return

schema.description: Opaque pagination cursor
schema.title: Cursor

parameters.description: Opaque pagination cursor

put.description:
Update a workspace's name and/or status.
- Set `name` to update the workspace name
- Set `status` to 'active' or 'inactive' to change the workspace status
- When setting status to 'inactive', all active connections in the workspace will be automatically disabled

delete.description:
Delete a workspace in both Coral and Sonar (soft delete in Sonar).
This will delete the workspace from Coral and mark it as deleted in Sonar.

AgentToolName.title: AgentToolName
AgentToolName.description:
Enum of tool names available to agents.
This enum is automatically synced to the frontend via OpenAPI generation,
ensuring type safety when handling tool calls and responses.
When adding a new tool to an agent (e.g., in app/agents/chat_agent.py),
add the corresponding tool name here to expose it to the frontend.

next.description: Next page url, empty if no more pages

o_auth_input_configuration.title: O Auth Input Configuration
o_auth_input_configuration.description: Required by the underlying API, but ignored in an embedded context.

return_secret_coordinate.title: Return Secret Coordinate
return_secret_coordinate.description: If set to true, returns a secret coordinate which references the stored tokens. By default, returns raw tokens.
